overview: Rosalie, a beautiful young woman gets involved with successful businessman Cesar. One day, Rosalie's former flame David appears and attempts to win her back. localised_title: Baby Cart: Dans la terre de l'ombre

localised_title: Ludwig ou le crépuscule des dieux

overview: When a shipment of heroin disappears between Italy and New York, a small-time pimp in Milan is framed for the theft. overview: Tang Lung arrives in Rome to help his cousins in the restaurant business. They are being pressured to sell their property to the syndicate, who will stop at nothing to get what they want. Le patron du syndicat engage les meilleurs artistes martiaux japonais et européens pour combattre Tang, mais il les termine facilement.

localised_title: Mimi métallo blessé dans son honneur

Quand ils attirent Mimi de retour en Sicile avec un meilleur travail, il doit garder son amant – et l'amour enfant – sous enveloppes.

overview: When the Earl of Gurney dies in a cross-dressing accident, his schizophrenic son, Jack, inherits the Gurney estate. Jack is not the average nobleman; he sings and dances across the estate and thinks he is Jesus reincarnated. Believing that Jack is mentally unfit to own the estate, the Gurney family plots to steal Jack's inheritance. As their outrageous schemes fail, the family strives to cure Jack of his bizarre behavior, with disastrous results.

Convaincue que Jack est mentalement inapte à posséder le domaine, la famille Gurney complote pour voler l'héritage de Jack.

overview_fr: Un romancier mystère conçoit une arnaque d'assurance avec l'amant de sa femme – mais les choses ne sont pas exactement comme elles semblent.

overview: The Morgans, a loving and strong family of Black sharecroppers in Louisiana in 1933, face a serious family crisis when the husband and father, Nathan Lee Morgan, is convicted of a petty crime and sent to a prison camp. After some weeks or months, the wife and mother, Rebecca Morgan, sends the oldest son, who is about 11 years old, to visit his father at the camp. The trip becomes something of an odyssey for the boy. During the journey he stays a little while with a dedicated Black schoolteacher.

Après quelques semaines ou des mois, la femme et mère, Rebecca Morgan, envoie le fils aîné, qui a environ 11 ans, visiter son père au camp. Le voyage devient quelque chose d'une odyssée pour le garçon.

overview: Mr. Hulot is the head designer of the Altra Automotive Co. His latest invention is a newfangled camper car loaded with outrageous extra features. Along with the company's manager and publicity model, Hulot sets out from Paris with the intention of debuting the car at the annual auto show in Amsterdam. The going isn't easy, however, and the group encounters an increasingly bizarre series of hurdles and setbacks en route.
Actors: Honoré Bostel, Marco Zuanelli, Franco Ressel, Maria Kimberly, Jacques Tati, Marcel Fraval, François Maisongrosse, Tony Knepper
overview_fr: M. Hulot est le concepteur principal de l'Altra Automotive Co. Sa dernière invention est une nouvelle voiture de camping-car fangled chargée de fonctionnalités supplémentaires scandaleuses. Avec le manager et le modèle de publicité de l'entreprise, Hulot part de Paris avec l'intention de commencer la voiture lors du salon automobile annuel à Amsterdam. Le déroulement n'est cependant pas facile, et le groupe rencontre une série de plus en plus bizarres d'obstacles et de revers en route.

overview: Report reaches the US cavalry that the Apache leader Ulzana has left his reservation with a band of followers. A compassionate young officer, Lieutenant DeBuin, is given a small company to find him and bring him back; accompanying the troop is McIntosh, an experienced scout, and Ke-Ni-Tay, an Apache guide. Ulzana massacres, rapes and loots across the countryside; and as DeBuin encounters the remains of his victims, he is compelled to learn from McIntosh and to confront his own naivity and hidden prejudices.
Actors: Lloyd Bochner, Jorge Luke, Douglass Watson, Richard Jaeckel, Bruce Davison, Joaquín Martínez, Burt Lancaster, Dran Hamilton, Karl Swenson, John Pearce
overview_fr: Un jeune officier compatissant, le lieutenant DeBuin, reçoit une petite compagnie pour le retrouver et le ramener; il accompagne la troupe McIntosh, un scout expérimenté, et Ke-Ni-Tay, un guide Apache. Ulzana massacre, viol et butin à travers la campagne; et comme DeBuin rencontre les restes de ses victimes, il est contraint d'apprendre de McIntosh et de confronter sa propre nativité et ses préjugés cachés.

overview: As Agnes slowly dies of cancer, her sisters are so deeply immersed in their own psychic pains that they can't offer her the support she needs. Maria is wracked with guilt at her husband's attempted suicide, caused by his discovery of her extramarital affair. The self-loathing, suicidal Karin seems to regard her sister with revulsion. Only Anna, the deeply religious maid who lost her young child, seems able to offer Agnes solace and empathy.
Actors: Ingrid Thulin, Inga Gill, Georg Årlin, Liv Ullmann, Harriet Andersson, Kari Sylwan, Erland Josephson, Anders Ek, Ingmar Bergman, Henning Moritzen
overview_fr: Alors qu'Agnès meurt lentement d'un cancer, ses soeurs sont si profondément plongées dans leurs propres douleurs psychiques qu'elles ne peuvent lui offrir le soutien dont elle a besoin. Maria est frappée de culpabilité à la suite de la tentative de suicide de son mari, causée par sa découverte de son affaire extra-maritale.

overview: The accidental mix-up of four identical plaid overnight bags leads to a series of increasingly wild and wacky situations.

overview_fr: Le mélange accidentel de quatre sacs de nuit identiques conduit à une série de situations de plus en plus sauvages et wacky.

overview: German journalist Philip Winter has a case of writer’s block when trying to write an article about the United States. He decides to return to Germany, and while trying to book a flight, encounters a German woman and her nine year old daughter Alice doing the same. The three become friends (almost out of necessity) and while the mother asks Winter to mind Alice temporarily, it quickly becomes apparent that Alice will be his responsibility for longer than he expected.
Actors: Sibylle Baier, Hans Hirschmüller, Edda Köchl, Lois Moran, Lisa Kreuzer, Didi Petrikat, Rüdiger Vogler, Sam Presti, Yella Rottländer, Ernest Boehm
overview_fr: Le journaliste allemand Philip Winter a un cas de bloc d'écrivains en essayant d'écrire un article sur les États-Unis. Il décide de retourner en Allemagne, et tout en essayant de réserver un vol, rencontre une femme allemande et sa fille de neuf ans Alice faisant de même. Les trois deviennent amis (presque par nécessité) et tandis que la mère demande à Winter de s'occuper temporairement d'Alice, il devient vite évident qu'Alice sera sa responsabilité pour plus de temps qu'il ne l'escomptait.

overview: After a tied 1st place in a local stunt race, two drivers start a contest to decide who of them will own the prize, a dune buggy. But when a mobster destroys the car, they are determined to get it back.

overview_fr: Après une première place à égalité dans une course de cascade locale, deux pilotes commencent un concours pour décider qui d'entre eux sera propriétaire du prix, un buggy de dunes. Mais quand un mafieux détruit la voiture, ils sont déterminés à le récupérer.

overview: A couple of high school graduates spend one final night cruising the strip with their buddies before they go off to college.
Actors: Mackenzie Phillips, Cindy Williams, Charles Martin Smith, Wolfman Jack, Paul Le Mat, Ron Howard, Bo Hopkins, Richard Dreyfuss, Manuel Padilla Jr., Candy Clark
overview_fr: Quelques diplômés du secondaire passent une dernière nuit à croiser le strip avec leurs copains avant de partir à l'université.

overview: In this riot of frantic disguises and mistaken identities, Victor Pivert, a blustering, bigoted French factory owner, finds himself taken hostage by Slimane, an Arab rebel leader. The two dress up as rabbis as they try to elude not only assasins from Slimane's country, but also the police, who think Pivert is a murderer. Pivert ends up posing as Rabbi Jacob, a beloved figure who's returned to France for his first visit after 30 years in the United States. Adding to the confusion are Pivert's dentist-wife, who thinks her husband is leaving her for another woman, their daughter, who's about to get married, and a Parisian neighborhood filled with people eager to celebrate the return of Rabbi Jacob.
Actors: Louis de Funès, Suzy Delair, Xavier Gélin, Henri Guybet, Miou-Miou, André Falcon, Janet Brandt, Renzo Montagnani, Claude Giraud, Marcel Dalio
overview_fr: Dans cette émeute de déguisements frénétiques et d'identités erronées, Victor Pivert, un propriétaire d'usine français blustering, bigoté, se retrouve pris en otage par Slimane, un dirigeant rebelle arabe. Les deux se déguisent en rabbins alors qu'ils tentent d'échapper non seulement aux assasins du pays de Slimane, mais aussi à la police, qui pense que Pivert est un meurtrier. Pivert finit par se poser comme Rabbi Jacob, un personnage bien-aimé qui est retourné en France pour sa première visite après 30 ans aux États-Unis.

overview: An impressionable teenage girl from a dead-end town and her older greaser boyfriend embark on a killing spree in the South Dakota badlands.

overview_fr: Une adolescente impressionnable d'une ville morte et son plus vieux petit ami graisseux s'embarquent dans une escapade meurtrière dans les badlands du Dakota du Sud.

overview: Released from prison under a New Year amnesty, a criminal tries to pick up the threads of a life changed not only by his daring plan to rob a jewelry store in out-of-season Cannes, but also by a very special someone he met there.

overview: A free-spirited young woman, Breezy, hitches a ride with an aging real estate salesman, Frank. Sensing that she just wants to use him he tries to have nothing to do with her. She's not that easy to shake, however, and over time a bond forms between them.

overview_fr: Une jeune femme libre d'esprit, Breezy, s'attache à un tour avec un vendeur immobilier vieillissant, Frank. Sensant qu'elle veut juste l'utiliser, il essaie de n'avoir rien à voir avec elle. Elle n'est pas si facile à secouer, cependant, et au fil du temps une forme de lien entre eux.

localised_title: François et le chemin du soleil
overview: In his delirium from his return from war, Francesco Bernardone goes back in his memories to the days when he lived for parties and carnal pleasures. He slowly recovers, but after the illness he is no longer the Francesco that everybody knew. Instead of spending hours in taverns, he meditates on the beauty of God's creatures, soon renouncing his riches and his family with plans to rebuild an abandoned church and his life.
Actors: John Sharp, Graham Faulkner, Alec Guinness, Lee Montague, Judi Bowker, Nicholas Willatt, Leigh Lawson, Kenneth Cranham, Valentina Cortese, Michael Feast
overview_fr: Dans son délire de son retour de la guerre, Francesco Bernardone revient dans ses souvenirs aux jours où il vivait pour des fêtes et des plaisirs charnels. Il se rétablit lentement, mais après la maladie, il n'est plus Francesco que tout le monde connaissait. Au lieu de passer des heures dans les tavernes, il médite sur la beauté des créatures de Dieu, renonçant bientôt à ses richesses et à sa famille avec des plans pour reconstruire une église abandonnée et sa vie.

overview: Charley Varrick robs a bank in a small town with his friends, but instead of obtaining a small amount of money, they discover they stole a very large amount of money belonging to the mob. Charley must now come up with a plan to not only evade the police but the mob as well.

overview_fr: Charley Varrick vole une banque dans une petite ville avec ses amis, mais au lieu d'obtenir une petite somme d'argent, ils découvrent qu'ils ont volé une très grande quantité d'argent appartenant à la mafia. Charley doit maintenant trouver un plan pour non seulement échapper à la police mais la mafia aussi.

overview: An international assassin known as ‘The Jackal’ is employed by disgruntled French generals to kill President Charles de Gaulle, with a dedicated gendarme on the assassin’s trail.

overview: A former bank robber is released after 10 years in prison. He gets help from a social-worker, but gets harassed by an old cop from his past.

overview: Laura and John, grieved by a terrible loss, meet in Venice, where John is in charge of the restoration of a church, two mysterious sisters, one of whom gives them a message sent from the afterlife.

overview: A short Arizona motorcycle cop gets his wish and is promoted to Homicide following the mysterious murder of a hermit. He is forced to confront his illusions about himself and those around him in order to solve the case, eventually returning to solitude in the desert.

overview: Hobos encounter a sadistic railway conductor that will not let anyone "ride the rails" for free.
Actors: Lee Marvin, Hal Baylor, Simon Oakland, Elisha Cook Jr., Matt Clark, Charles Tyner, Malcolm Atterbury, Ernest Borgnine, Keith Carradine, Harry Caesar
overview_fr: Hobos rencontre un conducteur de chemin de fer sadique qui ne laissera personne « monter les rails » gratuitement.

overview: A martial artist agrees to spy on a reclusive crime lord using his invitation to a tournament there as cover.
Actors: Ahna Capri, Robert Wall, Jim Kelly, Angela Mao, Bruce Lee, Bolo Yeung, Geoffrey Weeks, Kien Shih, John Saxon, Betty Chung
overview_fr: Un artiste martial accepte d'espionner un seigneur du crime reclus en utilisant son invitation à un tournoi là-bas comme couverture.

overview: In the aftermath of the Spanish Civil War, Ana, a sensitive seven-year-old girl in a rural Spanish hamlet is traumatized after a traveling projectionist screens a print of James Whale's 1931 "Frankenstein" for the village. The youngster is profoundly disturbed by the scenes in which the monster murders the little girl and is later killed himself by the villagers. She questions her sister about the profundities of life and death and believes her older sibling when she tells her that the monster is not dead, but exists as a spirit inhabiting a nearby barn. When a Loyalist soldier, a fugitive from Franco's victorious army, hides out in the barn, Ana crosses from reality into a fantasy world of her own.
Actors: Ketty de la Cámara, Isabel Tellería, Miguel Picazo, Laly Soldevila, Juan Margallo, José Villasante, Ana Torrent, Fernando Fernán Gómez, Estanis González, Teresa Gimpera
overview_fr: Au lendemain de la guerre civile espagnole, Ana, une jeune fille sensible de sept ans dans un hameau rural espagnol est traumatisée après qu'une projectionniste itinérante ait projeté pour le village une empreinte du "Frankenstein" de 1931 de James Whale. La jeune fille est profondément troublée par les scènes dans lesquelles le monstre tue la petite fille et se tue par la suite par les villageois. Elle interroge sa sœur sur les profondeurs de la vie et de la mort et croit son frère aîné quand elle lui dit que le monstre n'est pas mort, mais qu'il existe comme un esprit habitant une grange voisine. Lorsqu'un soldat loyaliste, fugitif de l'armée victorieuse de Franco, se cache dans l'étable, Ana traverse la réalité dans un monde imaginaire propre.

overview: 12-year-old Regan MacNeil begins to adapt an explicit new personality as strange events befall the local area of Georgetown. Her mother becomes torn between science and superstition in a desperate bid to save her daughter, and ultimately turns to her last hope: Father Damien Karras, a troubled priest who is struggling with his own faith.
Actors: Lee J. Cobb, William OMalley, Peter Masterson, Jason Miller, Max von Sydow, Ellen Burstyn, Barton Heyman, Jack MacGowran, Kitty Winn, Linda Blair
overview_fr: Regan MacNeil, 12 ans, commence à adapter une personnalité nouvelle explicite à des événements étranges qui arrivent dans la région de Georgetown. Sa mère se déchire entre la science et la superstition dans une tentative désespérée de sauver sa fille, et finit par se tourner vers son dernier espoir : le père Damien Karras, un prêtre troublé qui lutte avec sa propre foi.

originalTitle: Film d'amore e d'anarchia, ovvero 'stamattina alle 10 in via dei Fiori nella nota casa di tolleranza...'
overview: Set in Fascist Italy before the outbreak of World War II, the story centers on Tunin, a farmer turned anarchist who stays in a brothel while preparing to kill Benito Mussolini.  There he falls in love with one of the whores.

overview: An aging hood is about to go back to prison. Hoping to escape his fate, he supplies information on stolen guns to the feds, while simultaneously supplying arms to his bank robbing chums.

overview: Jack Beauregard, an ageing gunman of the Old West, only wants to retire in peace and move to Europe. But a young gunfighter, known as "Nobody", who idolizes Beauregard, wants him to go out in a blaze of glory. So he arranges for Jack to face the 150-man gang known as The Wild Bunch and earn his place in history.
Actors: Piero Lulli, Terence Hill, Henry Fonda, Jean Martin, Neil Summers, R.G. Armstrong, Karl Braun, Geoffrey Lewis, Steve Kanaly, Leo Gordon
overview_fr: Jack Beauregard, un canonnier vieillissant du Vieux-Ouest, veut seulement se retirer en paix et s'installer en Europe. Mais un jeune artilleur, connu sous le nom de "Personne", qui idolâtre Beauregard, veut qu'il sorte dans un éclat de gloire. Il arrange donc pour Jack de faire face à la bande de 150 hommes connue sous le nom de The Wild Bunch et de gagner sa place dans l'histoire.

overview: Krzysztof Zanussi's groundbreaking film chronicles a decade in the life of a young physics student whose absolute faith in the primacy of rationality and science is shaken by tragedy and affairs of the heart.

overview: A scientist builds a time machine and accidentally sends his apartment complex manager and a petty burglar to 16th century Moscow, while Tsar Ivan the Terrible travels to 1973.
Actors: Sergey Filippov, Vladimir Etush, Natalya Seleznyova, Mikhail Pugovkin, Leonid Kuravlyov, Natalya Kustinskaya, Saveliy Kramarov, Natalya Krachkovskaya, Aleksandr Demyanenko, Yuriy Yakovlev
overview_fr: Un scientifique construit une machine à remonter le temps et envoie accidentellement son directeur de complexe d'appartements et un petit cambrioleur à Moscou du 16ème siècle, tandis que le tsar Ivan le Terrible voyage à 1973.

overview: Recounts the last days of Jesus Christ from the perspective of Judas Iscariot, his betrayer. As Jesus' following increases, Judas begins to worry that Jesus is falling for his own hype, forgetting the principles of his teachings and growing too close to the prostitute Mary Magdalene. After Jesus has an outburst in a temple, Judas turns on him.
Actors: Carl Anderson, Ted Neeley, Pi Douglass, Bob Bingham, Kurt Yahjian, Larry Marshall, Josh Mostel, Barry Dennen, Yvonne Elliman, Paul Thomas
overview_fr: Recompte les derniers jours de Jésus-Christ du point de vue de Judas Iscariot, son traître. Alors que la suite de Jésus augmente, Judas commence à s'inquiéter que Jésus tombe pour son propre hype, oubliant les principes de ses enseignements et se rapprochant trop de la prostituée Marie-Madeleine. Après que Jésus a une explosion dans un temple, Judas tourne sur lui.

localised_title: Qui sera le boss à Hiroshima?
overview: Repeatedly beat to a pulp by gamblers, cops, and gangsters, lone wolf Shoji Yamanaka finally finds a home as a Muraoka family hitman and falls in love with boss Muraoka's niece. Pendant ce temps, les ambitions du chien fou Katsuutoshi Otomo attire le héros de notre série, Shozo Hirono, et l'autre yakuza dans une nouvelle ronde de sang.

overview: On the planet Ygam, the Draags, extremely technologically and spiritually advanced blue humanoids, consider the tiny Oms, human beings descendants of Terra's inhabitants, as ignorant animals. Ceux qui vivent en esclavage sont traités comme des animaux de compagnie simples et servent à divertir les enfants Draag; ceux qui vivent cachés dans le désert hostile de la planète sont périodiquement chassés et massacrés impitoyablement comme s'ils étaient vermines.

Désespéré, il décide de se cacher déguisé en femme jusqu'à ce qu'il puisse peindre une copie de la toile volée. Josef entreprend un voyage étrange à travers les nombreuses pièces du sanatorium, chacune qui évoque des mondes composés de ses souvenirs, rêves et cauchemars.

overview: In an Italian seaside town, young Titta gets into trouble with his friends and watches various local eccentrics as they engage in often absurd behavior. overview: Emmi Kurowski, a cleaning lady, is lonely in her old age. Her husband died years ago, and her grown children offer little companionship. One night she goes to a bar frequented by Arab immigrants and strikes up a friendship with middle-aged mechanic Ali. Soon Emmi and Ali are forced to confront their own insecurities about their future.

Un soir, elle va dans un bar fréquenté par des immigrants arabes et se heurte à une amitié avec le mécanicien d'âge moyen Ali. Leur relation se développe bientôt en quelque chose de plus, et la famille et les voisins d'Emmi critiquent leur mariage spontané. Bientôt Emmi et Ali sont obligés de confronter leurs propres insécurités sur leur avenir.

overview: Animals Are Beautiful People (aka Beautiful People) is a 1974 nature documentary about the wildlife in Southern Africa. Après le meurtre du shérif, la ville exige un nouveau shérif du gouverneur, de sorte que Hedley le convainc d'envoyer la ville le premier shérif noir de l'ouest.

overview: Private eye Jake Gittes lives off of the murky moral climate of sunbaked, pre-World War II Southern California. overview: A good-natured but unlucky Italian is constantly going on a difficult situations, but never lose his mood.

overview: This Surrealist film, with a title referencing the Communist Manifesto, strings together short incidents based on the life of director Luis Buñuel. Presented as chance encounters, these loosely related, intersecting situations, all without a consistent protagonist, reach from the 19th century to the 1970s. Touching briefly on subjects such as execution, pedophilia, incest, and sex, the film features an array of characters, including a sick father and incompetent police officers.
Actors: Paul Frankeur, François Maistre, Jean-Claude Brialy, Julien Bertheau, Michael Lonsdale, Michel Piccoli, Adolfo Celi, Adriana Asti, Pierre Maguelon, Monica Vitti
overview_fr: Ce film surréaliste, avec un titre faisant référence au Manifeste communiste, rassemble de courts incidents basés sur la vie du réalisateur Luis Buñuel. Présentés comme rencontres de hasard, ces situations étroitement liées, intersectueuses, toutes sans protagoniste cohérent, atteignent du 19ème siècle aux années 1970. Touchant brièvement sur des sujets tels que l'exécution, la pédophilie, l'inceste et le sexe, le film présente une série de personnages, dont un père malade et des policiers incompétents.

overview: A journalist suffering from burn-out wants to finally say goodbye to his office – but his boss doesn’t like the idea one bit.

overview_fr: Un journaliste qui souffre d'épuisement veut enfin dire au revoir à son bureau – mais son patron n'aime pas un peu l'idée.

overview: New York City English professor Axel Freed outwardly seems like an upstanding citizen. But privately Freed is in the clutches of a severe gambling addiction that threatens to destroy him.

overview_fr: Le professeur d'anglais Axel Freed, de New York, a l'air d'un honnête citoyen, mais le privé Freed est aux prises avec une forte dépendance au jeu qui menace de le détruire.

overview: In the continuing saga of the Corleone crime family, a young Vito Corleone grows up in Sicily and in 1910s New York. In the 1950s, Michael Corleone attempts to expand the family business into Las Vegas, Hollywood and Cuba.

originalTitle: Gruppo di famiglia in un interno
overview: A retired professor of American origin lives a solitary life in a luxurious palazzo in Rome. He is confronted by a vulgar Italian marchesa and her lover, her daughter and her daughter's boyfriend, and forced to rent to them an apartment on the upper floor of his palazzo. From this point on his quiet routine is turned into chaos by his tenants' machinations, and everybody's life takes an unexpected but inevitable turn.
Actors: Philippe Hersent, Umberto Raho, Guy Tréjan, Stefano Patrizi, Elvira Cortese, Jean-Pierre Zola, Burt Lancaster, Helmut Berger, Silvana Mangano, Claudia Marsani
overview_fr: Un professeur à la retraite d'origine américaine vit une vie solitaire dans un palazzo luxueux à Rome. Il est confronté à une marche italienne vulgaire et à son amant, sa fille et le petit ami de sa fille, et forcé de leur louer un appartement à l'étage supérieur de son palazzo. À partir de ce moment sur sa routine tranquille est transformé en chaos par les machinations de ses locataires, et la vie de tout le monde prend un tour inattendu mais inévitable.

overview: Harry is a retired teacher in his 70s living in the Upper West Side of New York City where his late wife and he raised his children--where he's lived all his life. When the building he lives in is torn down to make way for a parking garage, Harry and his beloved cat Tonto begin a journey across the United States, visiting his children, seeing a world he never seemed to have the time to see before, making new friends, and saying goodbye to old friends.
Actors: Herbert Berghof, Avon Long, Michael McCleery, Cliff De Young, Art Carney, Ellen Burstyn, René Enríquez, Rashel Novikoff, Josh Mostel, Philip Bruns
overview_fr: Harry est un enseignant retraité dans ses années 70 vivant dans l'Upper West Side de New York City où sa défunte épouse et il a élevé ses enfants - où il a vécu toute sa vie. Lorsque l'immeuble dans lequel il vit est détruit pour faire place à un garage de stationnement, Harry et son chat bien-aimé Tonto commencent un voyage à travers les États-Unis, visitent ses enfants, voyant un monde qu'il n'a jamais semblé avoir le temps de voir avant, se faisant de nouveaux amis, et disant au revoir à de vieux amis.

overview: The Alchemist assembles together a group of people from all walks of life to represent the planets in the solar system. The occult adept's intention is to put his recruits through strange mystical rites and divest them of their worldly baggage before embarking on a trip to Lotus Island. There they ascend the Holy Mountain to displace the immortal gods who secretly rule the universe.
Actors: Valerie Jodorowsky, Adriana Page, Burt Kleiner, Juan Ferrara, Horacio Salinas, Nicky Nichols, Richard Rutowski, Zamira Saunders, Luis Lomelí, Alejandro Jodorowsky
overview_fr: L'Alchimiste rassemble un groupe de personnes de tous les horizons pour représenter les planètes du système solaire. L'intention de l'adepte occulte est de mettre ses recrues à travers des rites mystiques étranges et de les dessaisir de leurs bagages mondains avant d'embarquer sur un voyage à l'île de Lotus. Là, ils montent la Montagne Sainte pour déplacer les dieux immortels qui gouvernent secrètement l'univers.

overview: Lyons, France. Michel Descombes is a watchmaker who lives alone with his teenage son Bernard. When the police visit and informs him that Bernard killed a man and is on the run with a girl, Michel realizes that he knew far less about his son than he thought .
Actors: Jean Rochefort, Cécile Vassort, Andrée Tainsy, Jacques Denis, Philippe Noiret, Jacques Hilling, Clotilde Joano, Julien Bertheau, Yves Afonso, William Sabatier
overview_fr: Lyons, France. Michel Descombes est un horloger qui vit seul avec son fils adolescent Bernard. Quand la police le visite et l'informe que Bernard a tué un homme et est en fuite avec une fille, Michel se rend compte qu'il en savait beaucoup moins sur son fils qu'il ne le pensait.

originalTitle: Jeder für sich und Gott gegen alle
overview: The film follows Kaspar Hauser (Bruno S.), who lived the first seventeen years of his life chained in a tiny cellar with only a toy horse to occupy his time, devoid of all human contact except for a man who wears a black overcoat and top hat who feeds him.
Actors: Willy Semmelrogge, Walter Ladengast, Volker Prechtel, Brigitte Mira, Michael Kroecher, Henry van Lyck, Herbert Achternbusch, Bruno S., Gloria Doer, Hans Musäus
overview_fr: Le film suit Kaspar Hauser (Bruno S.), qui a vécu les dix-sept premières années de sa vie enchaîné dans une minuscule cave avec seulement un cheval de jouet pour occuper son temps, dépourvu de tout contact humain, à l'exception d'un homme qui porte un manteau noir et un chapeau supérieur qui le nourrit.

originalTitle: Kozure Ôkami: Jigoku e ikuzo! Daigorô
localised_title: Baby Cart: Le paradis blanc de l'enfer
overview: In the sixth and final film of the Lone Wolf and Cub series, the final conflict between Ogami Itto and the Yagyu clan is carried out.

overview_fr: Dans le sixième et dernier film de la série Lone Wolf et Cub, le dernier conflit entre Ogami Itto et le clan Yagyu se déroule.

overview: In Louis Malle's lauded drama, Lucien Lacombe is a young man living in rural France during World War II who seeks to join the French Resistance. When he is rejected due to his youth, the resentful Lucien allies himself with the Nazis and joins the Gallic arm of their Gestapo. Lucien grows to enjoy the power that comes with his position, but his life is complicated when he falls for France Horn, a beautiful young Jewish woman.
Actors: Pierre Decazes, René Bouloc, Jean Rougerie, Pierre Blaise, Holger Löwenadler, Cécile Ricard, Therese Giehse, Loumi Iacobesco, Aurore Clément, Stéphane Bouy
overview_fr: Dans le drame de Louis Malle, Lucien Lacombe est un jeune homme vivant en France rurale pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale qui cherche à rejoindre la Résistance française. Lorsqu'il est rejeté en raison de sa jeunesse, le vexant Lucien s'allie aux nazis et rejoint le bras gallois de leur Gestapo. Lucien grandit pour jouir du pouvoir qui vient avec sa position, mais sa vie est compliquée quand il tombe pour France Horn, une belle jeune juive.

overview: The story of acerbic 1960s comic Lenny Bruce, whose groundbreaking, no-holds-barred style and social commentary was often deemed by the establishment as too obscene for the public.

overview_fr: L'histoire de la bande dessinée acerbique des années 1960 Lenny Bruce, dont le style révolutionnaire et sans bornes et le commentaire social étaient souvent considérés par l'établissement comme trop obscènes pour le public.

overview: In this rough-and-tumble yarn, filmed on-location at the Georgia State Prison, the cons are the heroes and the guards are the heavies. Eddie Albert is the sadistic warden who'll gladly make any sacrifice to push his guards' semi-pro football team to a national championship.
Actors: Burt Reynolds, Jim Nicholson, John Steadman, Mike Henry, James Hampton, Eddie Albert, Michael Conrad, Charles Tyner, Ed Lauter, Harry Caesar
overview_fr: Dans ce fil dur et douillet, filmé sur place à la prison d'État de Géorgie, les adversaires sont les héros et les gardiens sont les lourds. Eddie Albert est le gardien sadique qui fera volontiers tout sacrifice pour pousser son équipe de football semi-pro de ses gardes à un championnat national.

overview: Famed composer Gustav Mahler reflects on the tragedies of his life and failing marriage while traveling by train.

overview_fr: Le célèbre compositeur Gustav Mahler réfléchit aux tragédies de sa vie et à l'échec du mariage en voyageant en train.

originalTitle: Milano odia: la polizia non può sparare
overview: A psychotic small-time criminal realizes that the everyday robberies, rapes and murders he commits aren't profitable enough, so he figures to hit the big time by kidnapping the daughter of a rich man.

originalTitle: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
overview: King Arthur, accompanied by his squire, recruits his Knights of the Round Table, including Sir Bedevere the Wise, Sir Lancelot the Brave, Sir Robin the Not-Quite-So-Brave-As-Sir-Lancelot and Sir Galahad the Pure. On the way, Arthur battles the Black Knight who, despite having had all his limbs chopped off, insists he can still fight. They reach Camelot, but Arthur decides not  to enter, as "it is a silly place".
Actors: John Cleese, Neil Innes, Eric Idle, Bee Duffell, Michael Palin, Terry Jones, Carol Cleveland, Terry Gilliam, Connie Booth, Graham Chapman

Sur le chemin, Arthur combat le Chevalier Noir qui, bien qu'ayant eu tous ses membres coupés, insiste qu'il peut encore se battre. Ils atteignent Camelot, mais Arthur décide de ne pas entrer, car « c'est un endroit stupide ».

overview: Hassan Darabi, a troublesome, amoral 10-year-old boy in a small Iranian town wishes to see the Iran national football team play an important match in Tehran. In order to achieve that, he scams his friends and neighbors.

overview: In 1935, when his train is stopped by deep snow, detective Hercule Poirot is called on to solve a murder that occurred in his car the night before.

overview: After reading the diary of an elderly Jewish man who committed suicide, freelance journalist Peter Miller begins to investigate the alleged sighting of a former SS-Captain who commanded a concentration camp during World War II. Miller eventually finds himself involved with the powerful organisation of former SS members—called ODESSA—as well as with the Israeli secret service. Miller probes deeper and eventually discovers a link between the SS-Captain, ODESSA and his own family.
Actors: Jon Voight, Klaus Löwitsch, Kurt Meisel, Derek Jacobi, Maria Schell, Garfield Morgan, Mary Tamm, Hannes Messemer, Maximilian Schell, Peter Jeffrey
overview_fr: Après avoir lu le journal d'un juif âgé qui s'est suicidé, le journaliste freelance Peter Miller commence à enquêter sur l'observation présumée d'un ancien capitaine SS qui a commandé un camp de concentration pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Miller finit par s'impliquer dans la puissante organisation d'anciens membres SS – appelé ODESSA – ainsi que dans le service secret israélien. Miller sonde plus en profondeur et finit par découvrir un lien entre le capitaine SS, ODESSA et sa propre famille.

overview: A two-bit criminal takes on the Mafia to avenge his brother's death. Earl Macklin is a small time criminal who is released from prison after an unsuccessful bank robbery only to discover that a pair of gunmen killed his brother.

overview_fr: Un criminel bibit prend la mafia pour venger la mort de son frère. Earl Macklin est un petit criminel qui est libéré de prison après un vol de banque infructueux seulement pour découvrir qu'une paire d'hommes armés a tué son frère.

overview: An ambitious reporter gets in trouble while investigating a senator's assassination which leads to a vast conspiracy involving a multinational corporation behind every event in the world's headlines.

After Swan has Winslow sent to prison for trespassing, Winslow endures a freak accident that leaves him disfigured, after which he seeks revenge on both Swan and the Paradise.

overview: During the Swedish invasion of Poland, the brave warrior Andrzej Kmicic, considered a traitor to the nation, fights for a country, redemption and love across the 17th-century Polish territories.

overview: An army cadet accompanies an irascible, blind captain on a week-long trip from Turin to Naples.

originalTitle: The Return of the Pink Panther
localised_title: Le Retour de la panthère rose
overview: The famous Pink Panther jewel has once again been stolen and Inspector Clouseau is called in to catch the thief. The Inspector is convinced that 'The Phantom' has returned and utilises all of his resources – himself and his Asian manservant – to reveal the identity of 'The Phantom'.
Actors: Graham Stark, Christopher Plummer, Catherine Schell, Eric Pohlmann, Herbert Lom, Peter Sellers, Peter Arne, David Lodge, Grégoire Aslan, Peter Jeffrey
overview_fr: Le célèbre joyau de Pink Panther a de nouveau été volé et l'inspecteur Clouseau est appelé pour attraper le voleur. L'inspecteur est convaincu que 'Le fantôme' est revenu et utilise toutes ses ressources – lui-même et son serviteur asiatique – pour révéler l'identité de 'Le fantôme'.

originalTitle: Svoy sredi chuzhikh, chuzhoy sredi svoikh
overview: Following the Russian Civil War, a loyal Red, Shilov, must prove he is at home among strangers as he attempts to recapture a shipment of gold that he was supposed to deliver to Moscow. Needed as a means of buying food for the people, the gold Shilov was entrusted with is stolen, initially by a group of assassins and then by a group of bandits. In tracking the gold’s whereabouts, Shilov’s motives are questioned and he is suspected of treason, in part because his brother was a devoted White. In an effort to clear his name, Shilov locates the gold, but he also discovers rampant greed and corruption.
Actors: Aleksandr Porokhovshchikov, Yuriy Bogatyryov, Konstantin Raykin, Nikolay Zasukhin, Nikita Mikhalkov, Sergey Shakurov, Anatoliy Solonitsyn, Aleksandr Kalyagin, Aleksandr Kaydanovskiy, Nikolai Pastukhov
overview_fr: Après la guerre civile russe, un rouge fidèle, Shilov, doit prouver qu'il est à la maison parmi les étrangers alors qu'il tente de récupérer une cargaison d'or qu'il était censé livrer à Moscou. Nécessaire comme moyen d'acheter de la nourriture pour le peuple, l'or Shilov a été chargé d'être volé, d'abord par un groupe d'assassins, puis par un groupe de bandits.

originalTitle: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three
overview: In New York, armed men hijack a subway car and demand a ransom for the passengers. Even if it's paid, how could they get away?
Actors: Earl Hindman, Lee Wallace, Hector Elizondo, Tom Pedi, James Broderick, Robert Shaw, Martin Balsam, Dick ONeill, Walter Matthau, Beatrice Winde
overview_fr: À New York, des hommes armés détournent une voiture de métro et demandent une rançon pour les passagers.

overview: When Sally hears that her grandfather's grave may have been vandalized, she and her paraplegic brother, Franklin, set out with their friends to investigate. After a detour to their family's old farmhouse, they discover a group of crazed, murderous outcasts living next door. As the group is attacked one by one by the chainsaw-wielding Leatherface, who wears a mask of human skin, the survivors must do everything they can to escape.
Actors: Gunnar Hansen, Jim Siedow, Teri McMinn, Allen Danziger, Marilyn Burns, John Dugan, Edwin Neal, William Vail, Paul A. Partain, Robert Courtin
overview_fr: Quand Sally apprend que la tombe de son grand-père a peut-être été vandalisée, elle et son frère paraplégique, Franklin, partent avec leurs amis pour enquêter. Après un détour dans l'ancienne ferme de leur famille, ils découvrent un groupe d'outcasts foulés et meurtriers vivant à côté. Comme le groupe est attaqué un par un par le cuir à la tronçonneuse, qui porte un masque de peau humaine, les survivants doivent faire tout ce qu'ils peuvent pour s'échapper.

overview: The young D'Artagnan arrives in Paris with dreams of becoming a king's musketeer. He meets and quarrels with three men, Athos, Porthos, and Aramis, each of whom challenges him to a duel. D'Artagnan finds out they are musketeers and is invited to join them in their efforts to oppose Cardinal Richelieu, who wishes to increase his already considerable power over the king. D'Artagnan must also juggle affairs with the charming Constance Bonancieux and the passionate Lady De Winter, a secret agent for the cardinal.
Actors: Jean-Pierre Cassel, Raquel Welch, Frank Finlay, Christopher Lee, Michael York, Roy Kinnear, Richard Chamberlain, Spike Milligan, Geraldine Chaplin, Oliver Reed
overview_fr: Le jeune D'Artagnan arrive à Paris avec des rêves de devenir musquéteur du roi. Il rencontre et se dispute avec trois hommes, Athos, Porthos et Aramis, qui le défient chacun à un duel. D'Artagnan découvre qu'ils sont musqués et est invité à se joindre à eux dans leurs efforts pour s'opposer au cardinal Richelieu, qui souhaite augmenter son pouvoir déjà considérable sur le roi. D'Artagnan doit également jongler avec la charmante Constance Bonancieux et la passionnée Lady De Winter, agent secret du cardinal.

overview: With the help of an irreverent young sidekick, a bank robber gets his old gang back together to organise a daring new heist.
Actors: Eugene Elman, Catherine Bach, Roy Jenson, Burton Gilliam, Jeff Bridges, George Kennedy, Jack Dodson, Geoffrey Lewis, Gary Busey, Clint Eastwood
overview_fr: Avec l'aide d'un jeune sidekick irrévérencieux, un braqueur de banque rassemble son vieux gang pour organiser un nouveau braquage audacieux.

overview: At the opening party of a colossal—but poorly constructed—skyscraper, a massive fire breaks out, threatening to destroy the tower and everyone in it.
Actors: Steve McQueen, O.J. Simpson, Jennifer Jones, Susan Blakely, Fred Astaire, Richard Chamberlain, William Holden, Robert Vaughn, Paul Newman, Faye Dunaway
Writers: ['Stirling Silliphant', 'Thomas N. Scortia', 'Richard Martin Stern', 'Frank M. Robinson']
overview_fr: À l'ouverture d'un gratte-ciel colossal, mais mal construit, un incendie massif éclate, menaçant de détruire la tour et tout le monde dedans.

overview: Two whimsical, aimless thugs harass and assault women, steal, murder, and alternately charm, fight, or sprint their way out of trouble. They take whatever the bourgeoisie holds dear, whether it’s cars, peace of mind, or daughters. Marie-Ange, a jaded, passive hairdresser, joins them as lover, cook, and mother confessor. She’s on her own search for seemingly unattainable sexual pleasure.
Actors: Eva Damien, Miou-Miou, Patrick Dewaere, Michel Peyrelon, Jacques Chailleux, Dominique Davray, Gérard Boucaron, Brigitte Fossey, Christian Alers, Gérard Depardieu
overview_fr: Deux voyous fanatiques et sans but harcelent et agmentent les femmes, volent, tuent et charment alternativement, combattent ou sprintent leur façon de sortir des ennuis. Ils prennent tout ce que la bourgeoisie tient cher, qu'il s'agisse de voitures, de tranquillité d'esprit, ou de filles. Marie-Ange, coiffeuse passive jaded, les rejoint en tant qu'amant, cuisinier et confesseur mère.

originalTitle: Vincent, François, Paul... et les autres
localised_title: Vincent, François, Paul et les autres...
overview: Three friends face mid-life crises. Paul is a writer who's blocked. François has lost his ideals and practices medicine for the money; his wife grows distant, even hostile. The charming Vincent, everyone's favorite, faces bankruptcy, his mistress leaves him, and his wife, from whom he's separated, wants a divorce. The strains on the men begin to show particularly in François and Paul's friendship and in Vincent's health. A younger man, Jack, becomes attractive to Lucie, François's wife. Another young friend, the boxer Jean, who's like a son to Vincent and whose girlfriend is pregnant, has taken a bout with a merciless slugger. Has happiness eluded this circle of friends?
Actors: Gérard Depardieu, Catherine Allégret, Serge Reggiani, Ludmila Mikaël, Antonella Lualdi, Marie Dubois, Yves Montand, Michel Piccoli, Stéphane Audran, Umberto Orsini
overview_fr: Trois amis font face à des crises de mi-vie. Paul est un écrivain qui est bloqué. François a perdu ses idéaux et pratique la médecine pour l'argent; sa femme s'éloigne, même hostile. Le charmant Vincent, le favori de tout le monde, fait faillite, sa maîtresse le quitte, et sa femme, dont il est séparé, veut divorcer. Les tensions sur les hommes commencent à se manifester particulièrement dans l'amitié de François et Paul et dans la santé de Vincent. Un jeune homme, Jack, devient attrayant pour Lucie, la femme de François. Un autre jeune ami, le boxeur Jean, qui est comme un fils de Vincent et dont la petite amie est enceinte, a pris un coup avec une limace impitoyable. Le bonheur a échappé à ce cercle d'amis ?

overview: Mabel Longhetti, desperate and lonely, is married to a Los Angeles municipal construction worker, Nick. Increasingly unstable, especially in the company of others, she craves happiness, but her extremely volatile behavior convinces Nick that she poses a danger to their family and decides to commit her to an institution for six months. Alone with a trio of kids to raise on his own, he awaits her return, which holds more than a few surprises.

De plus en plus instable, surtout en compagnie d'autres, elle a soif de bonheur, mais son comportement extrêmement volatile convainc Nick qu'elle représente un danger pour leur famille et décide de l'engager dans une institution pendant six mois. Seul avec un trio d'enfants à élever de lui-même, il attend son retour, qui tient plus que quelques surprises.

overview: A young neurosurgeon inherits the castle of his grandfather, the famous Dr. Victor von Frankenstein. In the castle he finds a funny hunchback, a pretty lab assistant and the elderly housekeeper. Young Frankenstein believes that the work of his grandfather was delusional, but when he discovers the book where the mad doctor described his reanimation experiment, he suddenly changes his mind.

Le jeune Frankenstein croit que le travail de son grand-père était délirant, mais quand il découvre le livre où le médecin fou a décrit son expérience de réanimation, il change soudain d'avis.

overview: A dying man in his forties recalls his childhood, his mother, the war and personal moments that tell of and juxtapose pivotal moments in Soviet history with daily life.

localised_title: La Terre de la grande promesse
overview: The Polish film based on the book of the same name by Wladyslaw Reymont. Un portrait exceptionnel de l'expansion industrielle rapide montré à travers les yeux d'une ville polonaise.

overview: In the mid-1960s, a group of high school friends who live on the Near North Side of Chicago enjoy life to the fullest...parties, hanging out, meeting new friends. overview: Reflecting the tumultuous politics of the early ’70s in India, Deewar tells the story of a pair of impoverished brothers who, after their family is betrayed by the misplaced idealism of their father, struggle to survive on the streets of Mumbai. They head for a showdown when one becomes a policeman, and the other becomes a criminal.

Ils se dirigent vers un showdown quand l'un devient policier, et l'autre devient criminel.

overview: Based on the true story of would-be Brooklyn bank robbers John Wojtowicz and Salvatore Naturale. Sonny and Sal attempt a bank heist which quickly turns sour and escalates into a hostage situation and stand-off with the police. Sonny et Sal tentent un braquement de banque qui se transforme rapidement en une situation d'otage et s'éloigne de la police. Comme les motifs du braquement de Sonny sont lentement révélés et les choses deviennent plus compliquées, le braquement se transforme en cirque médiatique.

overview: Asterix and Obelix depart on an adventure to complete twelve impossible tasks to prove to Caesar that they are as strong as the Gods. You'll roar with laughter as they outwit, outrun, and generally outrage the very people who are trying to prove them "only human".

originalTitle: Du bi quan wang da po xue di zi

overview: Private eye Philip Marlowe is hired by ex-con Moose Malloy to find his girlfriend, a former lounge dancer. overview: Fox, a former circus performer, wins the lottery of DM 500,000 and can now have the life and things that he has always wanted. overview: The life and times of Dawn Davenport, showing her progression from bratty schoolgirl to crazed mass murderer - all of which stems from her parents' refusal to buy her cha-cha heels for Christmas.

overview: 100 miles north, a bit east and up, is Pinchcliffe, the home of bicycle repairman Reodor Felgen and his two assistants, Solan Gundersen and Ludvig. Sponsored by oil sheik Ben Redic Fy Fazan, they build the car "Il Tempo Gigante" to race against Reodor's former assistant Rudolf Blodstrupmoen, who has stolen one of Reodor's inventions to become a world racing champion.

overview: In the depression, Chaney, a strong silent streetfighter, joins with Speed, a promoter of no-holds-barred street boxing bouts. They go to New Orleans where Speed borrows money to set up fights for Chaney, but Speed gambles away any winnings.

overview: A Russian emigre prides himself on the way he's molded himself into a real Yankee in the USA, though the world he lives in, New York's Lower East Side in the late 19th century, is almost exclusively populated by other Jewish immigrants. overview: Adèle Hugo, daughter of renowned French writer Victor Hugo, falls in love with British soldier Albert Pinson while living in exile off the coast of England. Though he spurns her affections, she follows him to Nova Scotia and takes on the alias of Adèle Lewly. Albert continues to reject her, but she remains obsessive in her quest to win him over.

overview: Itinerant projection-equipment repairman Bruno Winter and depressed hitchhiker Robert Lander - a doctor who has just been through a break-up with his wife and a half-hearted suicide attempt - travel along the Western side of the East-German border in a repair truck, visiting worn-out movie theaters, learning to communicate across their differences.

overview: Servais Mont, a freelance photographer who works taking compromising photos, gets fascinated by Nadine Chevalier, a tormented low-budget movie actress married to an eccentric film photo collector.

overview_fr: Servais Mont, photographe freelance qui prend des photos compromettantes, est fasciné par Nadine Chevalier, une actrice de cinéma à faible budget tourmentée mariée à un collectionneur de photos excentrique.

originalTitle: Jeanne Dielman, 23 quai du Commerce, 1080 Bruxelles
localised_title: Jeanne Dielman, 23 quai du Commerce, 1080 Bruxelles

overview: A look at the life of renegade yakuza, Rikio Ishikawa, particularly the years from 1946 to 1950 when his violent antics get him in trouble with his own clan, Kawada, and then with the clan of his protector, Kozaburo Imai. In these years, he can rely on Chieko, a young Tokyo courtesan who gives him shelter. He's banished to Osaka, where he picks up a drug habit. Through it all, he keeps his friends and enemies off balance with unpredictable behavior - and he seems indestructible.

overview_fr: Un regard sur la vie de renégade yakuza, Rikio Ishikawa, en particulier les années de 1946 à 1950, quand ses amants violents le mettent en difficulté avec son propre clan, Kawada, puis avec le clan de son protecteur, Kozaburo Imai. Dans ces années, il peut compter sur Chieko, un jeune courtisane de Tokyo qui lui donne refuge. Il est banni à Osaka, où il prend une habitude de drogue.

overview: France, 1893. Joseph Bouvier attempts to shoot his love who refused to marry him and to commit suicide. Upon release from the filthy asylum where he was placed, with bullets still remaining in his head, he wanders the country roads and rapes and murders many teenagers over years. The judge Rousseau captures him, but to serve his ambition seeks to avoid that Bouvier is simply declared insane.

Après avoir été libéré de l'asile sale où il a été placé, avec des balles restant dans sa tête, il erre sur les routes de campagne et viole et assassine de nombreux adolescents au fil des ans. Le juge Rousseau le capture, mais pour servir son ambition cherche à éviter que Bouvier soit simplement déclaré fou.

overview: A married man who killed the wife of his best friend during a tryst feels compelled to turn himself in.

overview: Private detective and former football player Harry Moseby gets hired on to what seems a standard missing person case, as a former Hollywood actress whose only major roles came thanks to being married to a studio mogul wants Moseby to find and return her daughter. Harry voyage en Floride pour la trouver, mais il commence à voir un lien entre la fille fuyante, le monde des cascadeurs hollywoodiens, et un mécanicien suspect quand un meurtre non résolu vient à la lumière.

originalTitle: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
localised_title: Vol au-dessus d'un nid de coucou

Pendant qu'elles retournent sur le territoire russe à travers les campagnes, les soldats montrent leur compagnie, leurs sentiments, leurs peurs et leur héroïsme pour défendre leur patrie.

overview: In the early 1900s, Miranda attends a girls boarding school in Australia. One Valentine's Day, the school's typically strict headmistress treats the girls to a picnic field trip to an unusual but scenic volcanic formation called Hanging Rock. Despite rules against it, Miranda and several other girls venture off. It's not until the end of the day that the faculty realizes the girls and one of the teachers have disappeared mysteriously.

Une Saint-Valentin, la chef de l'école est généralement stricte traite les filles à une visite de terrain pique-nique à une formation volcanique inhabituelle mais scénique appelée Hanging Rock. Malgré les règles contre elle, Miranda et plusieurs autres filles s'aventurent. Ce n'est qu'à la fin de la journée que la faculté réalise que les filles et l'un des professeurs ont disparu mystérieusement.

overview: David Locke is a world-weary American journalist who has been sent to cover a conflict in northern Africa, but he makes little progress with the story. When he discovers the body of a stranger who looks similar to him, Locke assumes the dead man's identity. Cependant, il découvre rapidement que l'homme était un marchand d'armes, conduisant Locke dans des situations dangereuses. Aidée par une belle femme, Locke tente d'éviter à la fois la police et les criminels pour l'obtenir.

overview: Sweethearts Brad and Janet, stuck with a flat tire during a storm, discover the eerie mansion of Dr. Frank-N-Furter, a transvestite scientist. À travers des danses élaborées et des chansons rock, Frank-N-Furter dévoile sa dernière création : un homme musclé nommé 'Rockv'.

overview: Lewis and Clark, aka The Sunshine Boys, were famous comedians during the vaudeville era, but off-stage they couldn't stand each other and haven't spoken in over 20 years of retirement. Le neveu de Willy Clark est le producteur d'une émission de variétés télévisées qui veut présenter une réunion de ce duo classique. C'est à lui d'essayer de réunir à nouveau les Sunshine Boys.

overview: Charles Duchemin, a well-known gourmet and publisher of a famous restaurant guide, is waging a war against fast food entrepreneur Tri- catel to save the French art of cooking. overview: The film is a parody of Disney's Fantasia, though possibly more of a challenge to Fantasia than parody status would imply. In the context of this film, "Allegro non Troppo" means Not So Fast!, an interjection meaning "slow down" or "think before you act" and refers to the film's pessimistic view of Western progress (as opposed to the optimism of Disney's original).
Actors: Maurizio Micheli, Marialuisa Giovannini, Angela Finocchiaro, Osvaldo Salvi, Maurizio Nichetti, Néstor Garay, Franca Mantelli, Bruno Bozzetto, Jolanda Cappi, Mirella Falco

Dans le contexte de ce film, "Allegro non Tropo" signifie Pas si rapide!, une interjection signifiant "baisse" ou "pensez avant d'agir" et se réfère à la vision pessimiste du film sur le progrès occidental (par opposition à l'optimisme de l'original de Disney).

overview: Dr. Jenny Isaksson is a psychiatrist whose temporary position at a mental hospital offers only modest responsibilities. With her husband out of the country for a seminar and her daughter at camp, Jenny moves in with her grandparents, expecting a relaxing few months. Avec son mari hors du pays pour un séminaire et sa fille au camp, Jenny emménage avec ses grands-parents, attendant quelques mois de détente. Mais ce n'est pas longtemps avant des souvenirs désagréables de son enfance, l'apparition soudaine d'apparitions étranges, et un quasi viol pousse cette femme autrement stable au bord même de la santé mentale.

overview: Various experiences of childhood are seen in several sequences that take place in the small town of Thiers, France. overview: Giacinto lives with his wife, their ten children and various other family members in a shack on the hills of Rome. overview: Bruno Fioretti, known as "Mandrake", is an inveterate gambler who never misses a day at the horse racing track in Rome. He is doubly unlucky: he bets too much on one horse, and his wife is sleeping with his best friend because Mandrake is always at the track. overview: A cashier poses as a writer for blacklisted talents to submit their work through, but the injustice around him pushes him to take a stand.

overview_fr: Un caissier pose comme un écrivain pour les talents sur la liste noire pour soumettre leur travail à travers, mais l'injustice autour de lui le pousse à prendre position.

Actors: Didier Haudepin, Jennifer ONeill, Marie Dubois, Laura Antonelli, Rina Morelli, Marc Porel, Giancarlo Giannini, Claude Mann, Roberta Paladini, Massimo Girotti
overview_fr: Tullio Hermil est un aristocrate chauviniste qui expose sa maîtresse à sa femme, mais lorsqu'il croit qu'elle a été infidèle, il devient à nouveau enthousiasmé d'elle.

overview: It is 1943, and the German army—ravaged and demoralised—is hastily retreating from the Russian front. In the midst of the madness, conflict brews between the aristocratic yet ultimately pusillanimous Captain Stransky and the courageous Corporal Steiner. Stransky is the only man who believes that the Third Reich is still vastly superior to the Russian army. However, within his pompous persona lies a quivering coward who longs for the Iron Cross so that he can return to Berlin a hero. Steiner, on the other hand is cynical, defiantly non-conformist and more concerned with the safety of his own men rather than the horde of military decorations offered to him by his superiors.
Actors: Fred Stillkrauth, James Mason, Klaus Löwitsch, Dieter Schidor, Vadim Glowna, Roger Fritz, James Coburn, Burkhard Driest, Maximilian Schell, David Warner
overview_fr: C'est en 1943, et l'armée allemande, ravagée et démoralisée, se retire hâtivement du front russe. Au milieu de la folie, le conflit entre le capitaine Stransky, mais finalement pusillanime, et le courageux caporal Steiner. Stransky est le seul homme qui croit que le Troisième Reich est encore largement supérieur à l'armée russe. Cependant, dans son personnage pompeux se trouve un lâche qui aspire à la croix de fer pour qu'il puisse retourner à Berlin un héros. Steiner, d'autre part, est cynique, défiant et plus soucieux de la sécurité de ses propres hommes plutôt que de la horde des décorations militaires qui lui sont offertes par ses supérieurs.

overview: When Francois, a journalist, tours a big store for an article, he is chosen by the son of the newspaper's owner, Rambal-Cochet, as his new toy. Needing money and unwilling to quit his job, Francois agrees to this ridiculous assignment. Gradually befriending the spoiled boy, he induces him to play at making a newspaper, unveiling publicly the tyrannical way of life of the father. The powerful emotional climax we experience with the child astonishes both men.
Actors: Michel Robin, Daniel Ceccaldi, Pierre Richard, Gérard Jugnot, Charles Gérard, Suzy Dyson, Jacques François, Michel Bouquet, Fabrice Greco, Michel Aumont
overview_fr: Quand Francois, journaliste, visite un grand magasin pour un article, il est choisi par le fils du propriétaire du journal, Rambal-Cochet, comme son nouveau jouet. Nécessitant de l'argent et ne voulant pas quitter son travail, Francois accepte cette tâche ridicule. Peu à peu en se louant d'amitié avec le garçon gâté, il l'incite à jouer à la rédaction d'un journal, révélant publiquement le mode de vie tyrannique du père.

overview: Half-breed Keoma returns to his border hometown after service in the Civil War and finds it under the control of Caldwell, an ex-Confederate raider, and his vicious gang of thugs. To make matters worse, Keoma's three half-brothers have joined forces with Caldwell, and make it painfully clear that his return is an unwelcome one. Determined to break Caldwell and his brothers' grip on the town, Keoma partners with his father's former ranch hand to exact violent revenge.
Actors: Orso Maria Guerrini, Wolfango Soldati, Gabriella Giacobbe, Franco Nero, Olga Karlatos, Joshua Sinclair, Leonardo Scavino, Antonio Marsina, Donald OBrien, William Berger
overview_fr: Keoma demi-sang revient dans sa ville frontalière après le service dans la guerre civile et la trouve sous le contrôle de Caldwell, un ancien raideur de la Confédération, et son gang vicieux de voyous. Pour aggraver les choses, les trois demi-frères de Keoma ont uni leurs forces avec Caldwell, et il est douloureusement clair que son retour est un malvenu. Déterminé à briser Caldwell et la prise de ses frères sur la ville, Keoma s'associe à l'ancienne main de ranch de son père pour se venger avec violence.

originalTitle: The Killing of a Chinese Bookie
overview: Cosmo Vittelli, the proprietor of a sleazy, low-rent Hollywood cabaret, has a real affection for the women who strip in his peepshows and the staff who keep up his dingy establishment. He also has a major gambling problem that has gotten him in trouble before. When Cosmo loses big-time at an underground casino run by mobster Mort, he isn't able to pay up. Mort then offers Cosmo the chance to pay back his debt by knocking off a pesky, Mafia-protected bookie.

overview_fr: Cosmo Vittelli, le propriétaire d'un cabaret hollywoodien à faible loyer, a une réelle affection pour les femmes qui strip-teaseuses dans ses peepshows et le personnel qui maintient son établissement dingy. Il a également un problème majeur de jeu qui lui a déjà causé des ennuis. Quand Cosmo perd beaucoup de temps dans un casino souterrain dirigé par Mobster Mort, il n'est pas en mesure de payer. Mort offre alors à Cosmo la chance de rembourser sa dette en frappant un bookmaker protégé par la mafia.

originalTitle: The Little Girl Who Lives Down the Lane
localised_title: La petite fille au bout du chemin
overview: Quiet, withdrawn 13-year-old Rynn Jacobs lives peacefully in her home in a New England beach town. Whenever the prying landlady inquires after Rynn's father, she politely claims that he's in the city on business. But when the landlady's creepy and increasingly persistent son, Frank, won't leave Rynn alone, she teams up with kindly neighbor boy Mario to maintain the dark family secret that she's been keeping to herself.

overview: A psychiatrist, Martin Dysart, investigates the savage blinding of six horses with a metal spike in a stable in Hampshire, England. The atrocity was committed by an unassuming seventeen-year-old stable boy named Alan Strang, the only son of an opinionated but inwardly-timid father and a genteel, religious mother. As Dysart exposes the truths behind the boy's demons, he finds himself face-to-face with his own.

L'atrocité a été commise par un garçon stable de dix-sept ans, Alan Strang, le seul fils d'un père estimé mais intérieurement timide et d'une mère religieuse genteel. Dysart expose les vérités derrière les démons du garçon, il se retrouve face à face avec les siennes.

overview: A catalan manufacturer of intercoms travels to Madrid, accompanied by his mistress, to attend a hunt that he has organized. overview_fr: Un fabricant catalan d'interphones se rend à Madrid, accompagné de sa maîtresse, pour assister à une chasse qu'il a organisée. Son but principal est de se mêler aux gens de la haute société pour améliorer leur entreprise. Tout semble bien jusqu'à ce que le propriétaire de la ferme montre toute l'autorité sur James, qui est le véritable organisateur de la réunion. La célébration est des personnages divers qui vivent à côté de situations absurdes.

overview: In Rome, fascist supporter Emanuele attends a parade commemorating Adolf Hitler's historic meeting with Italian leader Benito Mussolini, leaving his apolitical wife, Antonietta, to tend to household duties. Antonietta encounters a man, Gabriele, who appears surprisingly nonplussed by the political event. Over the course of the day, the two forge a close friendship that will forever change their perceptions of life, love and politics.

Antonietta rencontre un homme, Gabriele, qui semble étonnamment non dépassé par l'événement politique. Au cours de la journée, les deux forgent une amitié étroite qui changera à jamais leur perception de la vie, de l'amour et de la politique.

overview: After being dumped by her live-in boyfriend, an unemployed dancer and her 10-year-old daughter are reluctantly forced to live with a struggling off-Broadway actor.
